name: Grow by Sacrifice
description:
This game is our submission to the first GoGodotJam

A 8-bit 2D platformer with a bit of bullet-hell not-so-hell. In Hell.

Reap and sow plants to use them as platforms to get deeper and deeper.
Are you skilled enough to reach the FINAL SACRIFICE?

Credits
======
xPheRe: Game Design, Level Design, Graphics and Programming
Dani-san: Music, Sound FX
